valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 3 Nov 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Tue 4 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 962 moving steadily northeastwards expected 60 miles west of Bailey 967 by midnight tonight

Occasional rain.
